sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_bd9e46e947320110a06c690cd36d4368
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:b0c982a547320110a06c690cd36d4390</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>want_to_request_controls</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {

    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }
	
	var req_sub_options = initReqSubOptions();
	
        g_form.setValue("requested_for", null);
        g_form.setReadOnly("requested_for", false);
        g_form.setMandatory("request_subtype", true);
        g_form.setDisplay("request_subtype", true);
	
	for (var i = 0; i < req_sub_options.length; i++) {
        g_form.addOption("request_subtype", req_sub_options[i].value, req_sub_options[i].label, i);
    }


    if (newValue == 'myself') {

		g_form.setValue("type_of_request", 'Employee request');
		
        for (i = 0; i < req_sub_options.length; i++) {
			
			if (req_sub_options[i].value === 'Ad hoc')
             g_form.removeOption("request_subtype", req_sub_options[i].label);
            
		}
		
        g_form.setValue("requested_for", g_user.userID);
        g_form.setReadOnly("requested_for", true);

    } else if (newValue == 'team_leader' || newValue == 'manager') {

		g_form.setValue("type_of_request", 'Delegate request');
		
        for (i = 0; i < req_sub_options.length; i++) {
			
			if (req_sub_options[i].value === 'Ad hoc')
             g_form.removeOption("request_subtype", req_sub_options[i].label);
            
		}
        

    }  else if (newValue == 'operator') {
		
		g_form.setValue("type_of_request", 'Specific request');
		
        for (i = 0; i < req_sub_options.length; i++) {

            if (req_sub_options[i].value === 'Ad hoc' ||
                req_sub_options[i].value === 'Standard' || req_sub_options[i].value === '')                {
                //
            } else
                g_form.removeOption("request_subtype", req_sub_options[i].label);
        }

    } else if (newValue == 'direct_report') {
		
		g_form.setValue("type_of_request", 'Exceptional request');
        g_form.setMandatory("request_subtype", false);
        g_form.setDisplay("request_subtype", false);


    }
}

function initReqSubOptions() {
    return [{
            label: "Astreinte",
            value: "Astreinte"
        },
        {
            label: "Facturé",
            value: "Facturé"
        },
        {
            label: "BCP",
            value: "BCP"
        },
        {
            label: "Prêt",
            value: "Prêt"
        },
        {
            label: "Standard",
            value: "Standard"
        },
        {
            label: "Ad hoc",
            value: "Ad hoc"
        },
        {
            label: "Perte",
            value: "Perte"
        },
        {
            label: "Vol",
            value: "Vol"
        }
    ];
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-11 14:53:11</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>bd9e46e947320110a06c690cd36d4368</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>want_to_request_controls</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_bd9e46e947320110a06c690cd36d4368</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:23:39</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Request for">8e8986e547320110a06c690cd36d431c</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
